alert.note: Alert for Stone; Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 7:33AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Taney and southeastern Stone Counties through 800 AM CDT... At 732 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Silver Dollar City, or near Branson, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Branson... Lake Taneycomo... Table Rock Lake... Hollister... Silver Dollar City... Forsyth... Merriam Woods... Rockaway Beach... Bull Creek... Indian Point... Branson West... Powersite... Ozark Beach... Walnut Shade... Edgewater Beach... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
